attributes.action: Stop Gordon Brown And His Department Making Tax Revenue Raising Rule Changes REtrospective
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Quite basic really.  It is unprecedented in British history for a chancellor of the exchequer to introduce taxation changes and make them retrospective.  This chancellor has made it a nasty habit.

It is immoral to do so and this most recent of money snatching practices should stop now.  The most recent one being the increase in Air Passenger duty, enforced upon travellers who had previously already purchased tickets for future travel.

Please support this petition.
